snippet.title: Battle Bows - Official Trailer | Upload VR Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
Battle Bows is a 3D castle defense VR game where players are tasked with defending their home castle. Players can equip a variety of elemental arrows such as Fire and Ice to fight against the hordes of enemies knocking at the castle doorstep. Rise up the leaderboards and combat powerful bosses. Battle Bows is launching on July 13 for Meta Quest 3 and Steam.

#GameTrailers #VR #SummerofGaming
